attributes.action: make 23 April, St George's Day, a national bank holiday in England.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
England needs a national day of celebration. A day when all the English - regardless of colour, religion or sexuality - can recognise what binds us together.

Everything from Cricket to Curry could be celebrated on our national day.

Northern Ireland has had a bank holiday on St Patricks Day for decades and the Scottish Parliament recently made St Andrews Day a 'voluntary' bank holiday. England should now be given a bank holiday on St Georges Day.

rejection.details: This is similar to another petition : http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/stgeorgeevents/
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
